Maintenance Officer Job at Class Suites Hotels & Apartments




        
    

        
        Class Suites Hotels & Apartments is a modern-style hotel chain with numerous locations in Lagos, Abuja, and Ibadan and is in close proximity to the Airport.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Maintenance Officer

Job Location: Jabi, Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Inspections and Assessments: Performing regular site visits to inspect buildings and grounds, identifying potential issues, and assessing the need for repairs.
	General Repairs: Handling minor repairs, such as painting, tiling, plastering, carpentry, plumbing, and landscaping.
	Contractor Management: Liaising with external contractors to ensure repairs and servicing are carried out to a satisfactory standard and within budget.
	Preventive Maintenance: Adhering to and managing preventive maintenance schedules for equipment and facilities to prevent malfunctions.
	Health and Safety: Ensuring compliance with health and safety regulations and promptly reporting any safety hazards or issues.
	Record Keeping: Maintaining accurate logs and records of maintenance activities, using asset management software to track work orders and inventory.
	Groundskeeping: Undertaking general grounds maintenance, including mowing, weeding, watering, and keeping car parks and entrances clear and safe.
	Building and Equipment Maintenance: Conducting routine repairs and maintenance on facilities, grounds, equipment, and plant infrastructure.


Requirement


	Interested candidates should possess SSCE / GCE / NECO qualification.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: Jobs@classsuite.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
